import Button from "./Button.js"; const ExcursionInfo = ({ excursion }) => { return (

{excursion.title}

{excursion.dp1}

{excursion.dp2}

{excursion.dp3}

Cost: ${excursion.cost}

Duration: {excursion.duration}

Seasons: {excursion.seasons}

Ages: {excursion.ages}

Maximum Participants: {excursion.maxPpl}

) } export default ExcursionInfo
